title: FREE DOWNLOAD: My Inside Weather (in English)
text:
FREE DOWNLOAD: My Inside Weather (in English)

Sometimes our feelings are hard to talk about, but everyone knows how to talk about the weather.

Sometimes it feels like people don't understand the feelings I have inside.

Do you feel like that too? Read on...

Created by Jen Thorpe (writer), Lara Berge (illustrator) and Emma Beckett (designer). Edited by Janita Holzhausen.



This story is brought to you by Book Dash, a local organisation that gathers creative volunteers to create new African storybooks that anyone can freely print, translate and distribute.



Sign up to our newsletter to be notified of new bedtime stories for kids
